title: Naming the Tree feat. Chloe Coleman
dc:creator: WBUR
description: In part three of our summer series with the Boston Symphony Orchestra, Chloe Coleman (Timmy Failure, My Spy) stars in an African tale about how bigger isn't always better, and how slow and steady can be best of all!
itunes:author: WBUR
itunes:title: Naming the Tree feat. Chloe Coleman
